customFieldPrefix.name: customFieldPrefix
customFieldPrefix.description: Prefix for classes generated from custom fields. Default: empty.

customFieldSuffix.name: customFieldSuffix
customFieldSuffix.description: Suffix for classes generated from custom fields. Default: empty.

customFieldInfix.name: customFieldInfix
customFieldInfix.description: String between sobject name and field name. Default: '_'.

standardValueSetPrefix.name: standardValueSetPrefix
standardValueSetPrefix.description: Prefix for classes generated from standard value sets. Default: empty.

standardValueSetSuffix.name: standardValueSetSuffix
standardValueSetSuffix.description: Suffix for classes generated from standard value sets. Default: empty.

globalValueSetPrefix.name: globalValueSetPrefix
globalValueSetPrefix.description: Suffix for classes generated from global value sets. Default: empty.

globalValueSetSuffix.name: globalValueSetSuffix
globalValueSetSuffix.description: Suffix for classes generated from global value sets. Default: empty.

record-types.description:
Generate Apex constants from record types defined in your source.
You can use `RecordTypes.ACCOUNT_AGENT_ID`instead of `Schema.SObjectType.Account.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Agent');`
or `RecordTypes.ACCOUNT_AGENT` to access RecordTypeInfo.

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: Default: default package directory from sfdx-project.json.
